career.name: Junior Full Stack Developer
career.title: Creaxon, Inc
description: Built and maintained 10+ responsive websites using React, Next.js, Tailwind, SCSS, Material UI, WordPress, and Shopify—translating Figma designs into production-ready UIs, refactoring legacy code, and optimizing for accessibility and performance.
Handled full-stack deployment workflows including SEO improvements, Cloudways deployment, server access via PuTTY/SFTP, and team collaboration using GitLab for version control and merge management.

career.name: Full Stack Web Developer & Project Manager
career.title: Freelance / Project-based
description: Led full-stack development for client projects—managed timelines, gathered requirements, guided a small dev team, and translated business needs into scalable solutions.
Built and deployed modern web apps with React, Tailwind, Supabase, and Node.js—handled UI, API integration, auth, and Git-based workflows with code reviews and best practices.

career.name: Lead Programmer - Intern
career.title: Library - CvSU - CCAT Campus
description: Built a Python desktop app to monitor library PC sessions, automate usage tracking, and streamline reporting—enhancing internal workflows with a redesigned interface.
Provided tech and operational support for hardware, software, and front desk tasks—boosted system reliability and assisted in record management and user onboarding.
